Title: Wild Oats
Writer: Claudia Myers (screenplay by), Gary Kanew (screenplay by), Gary Kanew (story by)
Actors: Shirley MacLaine, Jessica Lange, Demi Moore, Ptolemy Slocum
Plot: A retired widow who hits the jackpot when she receives a life insurance check mistakenly made out for $5,000,000 instead of $50.000. She and her best friend then take off, only to become media sensations and fugitives from justice.
